stimulusHtml: Which of the following changes can be made so that the method works as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following method. 

 

public void removeAll(int target, ArrayList<Integer> list) 
{ 
   for (int index = list.size(); index >= 0; index--)  // Line 3
   { 
      if (list.get(index) == target)                   // Line 5
      { 
         list.remove(index); 
      } 
   } 
}

 

The method is intended to remove all values matching a target value from its  ArrayList  parameter. However, it is not working as intended.

choicesHtml: In line 3, changing the loop initialization to  index = list.size() – 1
In line 3, changing the loop condition to  index > 0
In line 3, changing the loop increment to  index++
In line 5, changing the list access expression to  list.get(target)
